archimate:Requirement.name: BA.1.2.1b: b) reviewing content to ensure that it is accurate (e.g. that hyperlinks are valid and functional, and that vulnerabilities have not been introduced by scripts or hidden form fields)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
